## mapType() function

Constructs a [Type](./paratype.type.md) that represents a map with string keys and uniform values

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function mapType<T>(valueType: Type<T>): Type<Map<string, T>>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  valueType | [Type](./paratype.type.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt; | Type of values |

<b>Returns:</b>

[Type](./paratype.type.md)<!-- -->&lt;Map&lt;string, T&gt;&gt;
